subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Nino Schurter of Switzerland defeated the Olympic champion Julien Absalon of France by three seconds in a sprint finish at the cross-country race in the world mountain bike championships.
snippet: Nino Schurter of Switzerland defeated the Olympic champion Julien Absalon of France by three seconds in a sprint finish at the cross-country race in the world mountain bike championships.
